title: S3 access key rotation for prod
body: Customer reports failure after rotating S3 access key. Need steps to update IAM credentials in prod and restart the sync worker.

title: App freezes when opening dashboard
body: UI hangs on dashboard load after v3.2.1. Logs show 'render timeout' and high CPU in renderer.

title: Email delivery delayed
body: SMTP queue backed up. Investigate rate limits and retry settings.

title: OAuth token refresh failing
body: Token refresh returns 401 after rotating client secret. Need to update secret in service and restart auth worker.

title: Rotate S3 access keys safely
body: Steps: create new access key, update credentials in prod secrets, deploy config, restart sync worker, then deactivate old key.

title: Dashboard render timeout fix
body: Increase render timeout to 120s and disable heavy widgets. Also check CPU spikes in renderer service.

title: OAuth client secret rotation
body: Update the client secret in the auth service environment, redeploy, and verify token refresh flow with test user.

title: Email queue backlog
body: Check SMTP rate limits, increase worker concurrency, and verify retry backoff settings.
